Title: Word To SharePoint (Transform Word Documents to MOSS / WSS)
Description: A SharePoint Feature for easy conversion of Word 2007 documents to Sharepoint/MOSS. The solution also extracts, transfers and re-links images to a selected ImageLibrary, includes styles, tables, etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A SharePoint Feature for easy conversion of Word 2007 documents to Sharepoint/MOSS. The solution also extracts, transfers and re-links images to a selected ImageLibrary, includes styles, tables, etc.
